mapper.select: SELECT field.field_of_business_name as field_of_business_name, land.company_name as company_name, land.company_tel as company_tel, land.business_registration_number as business_registration_number, land.sales as sales, land.available_staff as available_staff FROM field_of_business field, landscaping_enterprise land, landscaping_field_business lf WHERE land.landscaping_enterprise_no = lf.landscaping_enterprise_no AND lf.field_of_business_no = field.field_of_business_no AND land.landscaping_enterprise_id = #{sessionID}

SELECT pub.name as name, pub.affiliated_department as affiliated_department, pub.public_official_tel as public_official_tel, ct.cities_name, met.metropolitan_city_name FROM public_official pub, cities ct, metropolitan_city met WHERE pub.public_official_id = #{sessionID} AND pub.cities_no = ct.cities_no AND ct.metropolitan_city_no = met.metropolitan_city_no
